svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ PICOT FRAMEWORK │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ P - Population │ │ Who is included in the experiment? │ │ Example: andquot;All US mobile users, age 18+andquot; │ │ │ │ I - Intervention │ │ What change are you testing? │ │ Example: andquot;New ML recommendation model v2.5andquot; │ │ │ │ C - Comparison │ │ What is the control/baseline? │ │ Example: andquot;Current recommendation model v2.4andquot; │ │ │ │ O - Outcome │ │ What metrics will you measure? │ │ Example: andquot;Click-through rate, conversion rateandquot; │ │ │ │ T - Time │ │ How long will the experiment run? │ │ Example: andquot;14 days minimum, 21 days maximumandquot; │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
